column4: Ubuntu does the same thing for me, marklewis, but for some reason, it chose the right one, heh.
If I plug in my webcam, it becomes the default OSS device, and it tries to play sound through it. :0
my onboard sound card is disabled in the BIOS, but Ubuntu /still/ finds it, marklewis. o_O
Same here.  Turned off in the BIOS.
